room_title: Escape room "Skull & Bones" by Escape Zone Long Island in New York
review: My son and his friends celebrated his 16th birthday last night at escape zone. Staff were wonderful and accommodating. They made it a fun and enjoyable night for all the kids. Will definitely return!!

room_title: Escape room "Skull & Bones" by Escape Zone Long Island in New York
review: Excellent story lines, excellent staff. Fun for the entire family!!

room_title: Escape room "Skull & Bones" by Escape Zone Long Island in New York
review: Fun and challenging! Matt and Michaela were super enthusiastic and helpful! a great time! We made it out of the pirate room with 3 minutes to spare.
